My flight arrived to Macau at 10:30am and i believe its too early to check in therefore i decided to go to the city spend sometimes there and come to check in at around 3pm but when i came and waiting in check in queue for almost 20min the receptionist informed me that the room not ready and need 02 hours, and she promised me that she will offer me a free upgrade, i said that's fine i can go to the shopping mall and try to have some coffee there as i'm bit tired of walking from 10:30am and as well my kids got very tired after 02 hours again i came to check in and the gentlemen as well informed that the room not ready then i become very angry and explained to him that i will not wait anymore and my kids got very tired then started to work on his computer in a few minute the room_
